channel.title: data centers on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in data centers on Notes

item.title: CS138-lecture-20210504
item.description: LAN cont. # Switches vs routers # VLAN # VLAN = virtual local area network Data center networks # TOR = top of rack A day in the life of a web request # DHCP (UDP) > ARP (BGP) > DNS > HTTP (TCP) Summary # Review # What is the difference between network and transport layer? Network is machine to machine, transport is process to process
